properties.name: Paris Rive Gauche
properties.label: Compliant
properties.verification_basis: Listed as a sector under the PLU bioclimatique thematic OAP "Quartier du quart d’heure" (Paris – Rive Gauche, 13e).

properties.name: Clichy-Batignolles
properties.label: Compliant
properties.verification_basis: Paris.fr describes a mixed-use project within Clichy-Batignolles (Stream Building) "dans l’esprit de la ville du quart d’heure".

properties.name: Le Marais
properties.label: Compliant
properties.verification_basis: No reliable official City of Paris / PLU source was found that explicitly identifies Le Marais as a "ville du quart d’heure" implementation area (it may still be walkable/dense, but that is not the same as an explicit designation).

properties.name: Beaugrenelle / 15th Arr.
properties.label: Compliant
properties.verification_basis: Listed as a sector under the PLU bioclimatique thematic OAP "Quartier du quart d’heure" (Beaugrenelle – Front de Seine, 15e).

properties.name: Saint-Vincent-de-Paul (14e)
properties.label: Compliant
properties.verification_basis: Identified as OAP n°8 (Saint-Vincent de Paul, XIVe) in the Paris PLU bioclimatique report; this OAP is presented within the PLU choices for OAPs and supports proximity amenities and active mobility consistent with the 'quartier du quart d’heure' (15-minute city) approach.
properties.verification_by: Ville de Paris (PLU bioclimatique – Rapport de présentation)

properties.name: Maine–Montparnasse (6e/14e/15e)
properties.label: Compliant
properties.verification_basis: Identified as OAP n°9 (Maine-Montparnasse, VIe/XIVe/XVe) in the Paris PLU bioclimatique report; it emphasizes reallocating street space and improving walking/cycling connections, consistent with proximity-based planning.
properties.verification_by: Ville de Paris (PLU bioclimatique – Rapport de présentation)

properties.name: Bartholomé–Brancion (15e)
properties.label: Compliant
properties.verification_basis: Identified as OAP n°10 (Bartholomé-Brancion, XVe) in the Paris PLU bioclimatique report; it focuses on improving the public realm and continuity for active mobility.
properties.verification_by: Ville de Paris (PLU bioclimatique – Rapport de présentation)

properties.name: Paul Bourget (13e)
properties.label: Compliant
properties.verification_basis: Identified as OAP n°4 (Paul Bourget, XIIIe) in the Paris PLU bioclimatique report; it is included in the OAP choices supporting local quality of life and proximity amenities.
properties.verification_by: Ville de Paris (PLU bioclimatique – Rapport de présentation)

properties.name: Olympiades / Villa d’Este / Place de Vénétie (13e)
properties.label: Compliant
properties.verification_basis: Identified as OAP n°5 (Olympiades/Villa d’Este–Place de Vénétie, XIIIe) in the Paris PLU bioclimatique report; it fits within the PLU’s proximity-oriented planning framework.
properties.verification_by: Ville de Paris (PLU bioclimatique – Rapport de présentation)

properties.name: Bédier–Oudiné (13e)
properties.label: Compliant
properties.verification_basis: Identified as OAP n°7 (Bédier–Oudiné, XIIIe) in the Paris PLU bioclimatique report; it supports upgrading the area with improved connections and local quality-of-life goals.
properties.verification_by: Ville de Paris (PLU bioclimatique – Rapport de présentation)
